data.title: Megabit will launch VVV/USDT contract trading
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, Megabit will officially launch VVV/USDT contract trading at 18:00 (SGT) on February 4.

data.title: BitMEX has launched S spot trading
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to the official announcement, BitMEX has launched S spot trading, and deposits, trading and exchange of S are now open.

data.title: The suspected Movement team address deposited 1,824 ETH into Binance 30 minutes ago
data.description: The Data Nerd's monitoring shows that the suspected Movement team address deposited 1,824 ETH (about 4.97 million US dollars) into Binance 30 minutes ago. These ETH were removed from the liquidity pool last week.

data.title: Dovey: I was not aware of Binance's launch of Hooked Protocol in advance. Primitive's unlocking cycle is the same as other VCs
data.description:
In response to questions about Hooked Protocol's investment share and token unlocking, Dovey Wan, founding partner of Primitive Ventures, responded in the community Space today that Primitive Ventures' valuation when investing in Hooked Protocol was $30 million, and the token unlocking cycle is the same as other VCs, starting at the end of 2023.
Dovey added that due to the sensitive relationship with Jason, the founder of Hooked Protocol (the two were once lovers), he deliberately did not participate too much in the project, and even after Binance officially announced the launch of Hooked Protocol, he was surprised "why the product was launched so early."

data.title: BNB Drops Below 570 USDT with a 0.93% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Feb 04, 2025, 07:48 AM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, BNB has dropped below 570 USDT and is now trading at 569.849976 USDT, with a narrowed 0.93% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Pixion Games Secures $12.4 Million Funding For Fableborne Launch
data.description: According to Odaily, Pixion Games, the studio behind the Web3 action role-playing game Fableborne, has successfully raised $12.4 million in its latest funding round. The round was led by Delphi Ventures, with participation from Animoca Brands, Yield Guild Games (YGG), and Sky Mavis, the creators of Axie Infinity. This funding is intended to support the launch of the POWER token later this year. Fableborne is a free-to-play Web3 action RPG built on the Ronin blockchain and is currently in its first season of development.

data.title: Eric Trump Advocates For Increased ETH Holdings
data.description: According to Foresight News, Eric Trump, the younger son of U.S. President Donald Trump, recently stated on social media that "now is the best time to increase ETH holdings."

data.title: Tron and Movement Labs Deny Involvement in WLFI Token Swap
data.description: According to Odaily, Tron has clarified that it did not participate in the token swap agreement proposed by the WLFI crypto project, which is associated with U.S. President Donald Trump's initiatives. A Tron spokesperson informed CoinDesk that the company was not involved in any such token exchange. Similarly, Rushi Manche, co-founder of Movement Labs, stated earlier to CoinDesk that no tokens were sent to anyone, including WLFI. Manche emphasized that there were no transactions or backdoor deals, describing the situation as purely market-driven purchases.

data.title: ZachXBT claims Coinbase users lost over $65 million to social engineering scams in last two months
data.description:
The blockchain sleuth claimed that Coinbase failed to prevent social engineering attacks on exchange users.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/338686/coinbase-users-lost-65-million-social-engineering-attacks-zachxbt?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: Real-World Asset Tokenization Markets Reach New Heights
data.description: According to Cointelegraph, the real-world asset (RWA) tokenization markets have reached an all-time high in terms of value tokenized onchain, with a total value locked (TVL) of $17.1 billion. This milestone, achieved in early February, marks a significant recovery for the sector, which has seen a 94% increase in TVL compared to the same period last year, as reported by industry analytics platform RWA.xyz. The surge in RWA tokenization markets coincides with a broader recovery in the crypto market, driven by news that U.S. President Donald Trump has temporarily halted tariffs targeting Canada and Mexico. Over the past 24 hours, the total crypto market capitalization has risen by approximately 7%, with RWA-related digital assets experiencing even greater gains. Notably, Chainlink (LINK), a blockchain oracle provider for real-world assets, saw its native token increase by 22%, reaching over $21. Similarly, Mantra (OM), a layer-1 blockchain focused on RWA, saw its token rise by 23% to $6, while Ondo Finance (ONDO), a DeFi platform, surged nearly 27% to $1.40. The RWA tokenization market's TVL began to rise sharply in early November, aligning with a broader crypto market surge. Since then, it has increased by approximately 26%, or $4 billion. Private credit accounts for nearly 70% of the onchain value, followed by U.S. Treasury debts at 21%, according to RWZ.xyz. Wall Street is also taking notice of the RWA tokenization market, which is projected to reach $30 trillion. Haqq Network co-founder Andrey Kuznetsov highlighted the transformative impact of asset tokenization on financial markets, noting that major financial institutions are preparing to lead this change. Eli Cohen, general counsel of the RWA tokenization platform Centrifuge, anticipates that the Trump administration will publicly renounce restrictive policies, further boosting RWA market growth in 2025.
